original: Paṭisambhidāmagga
analyzed: paṭisambhidā magga

original: 3 Paññāvagga
analyzed: paññāvagga

original: 3.3. Abhisamayakathā
analyzed: abhisamaya kathā

original: Abhisamayoti.
analyzed: abhisamaya iti

original: Kena abhisameti?
analyzed: kena abhisameti

original: Cittena abhisameti.
analyzed: cittena abhisameti

original: Hañci cittena abhisameti, tena hi aññāṇī abhisameti?
analyzed: hañci cittena abhisameti tena hi aññāṇī abhisameti

original: Na aññāṇī abhisameti.
analyzed: na aññāṇī abhisameti

original: Ñāṇena abhisameti.
analyzed: ñāṇena abhisameti

original: Hañci ñāṇena abhisameti, tena hi acittena ca ñāṇena ca acittako abhisameti?
analyzed: hañci ñāṇena abhisameti tena hi acittena ca ñāṇena ca acittakaḥ abhisameti

original: Na acittako abhisameti.
analyzed: na acittakaḥ abhisameti

original: Cittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti.
analyzed: cittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti

original: Hañci cittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti, tena hi kāmāvacaracittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti?
analyzed: hañci cittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti tena hi kāmāvacara cittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti

original: Na kāmāvacaracittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti.
analyzed: na kāmāvacara cittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti

original: Tena hi rūpāvacaracittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti?
analyzed: tena hi rūpāvacara cittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti

original: Na rūpāvacaracittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti.
analyzed: na rūpāvacara cittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti

original: Tena hi arūpāvacaracittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti?
analyzed: tena hi arūpāvacara cittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti

original: Na arūpāvacaracittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti.
analyzed: na arūpāvacara cittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti

original: Tena hi kammassakatacittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti?
analyzed: tena hi kammassakata cittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti

original: Na kammassakatacittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti.
analyzed: na kammassakata cittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti

original: Tena hi saccānulomikacittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti?
analyzed: tena hi sacca ānulomika cittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti

original: Na saccānulomikacittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti.
analyzed: na sacca ānulomika cittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti

original: Tena hi atītacittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti?
analyzed: tena hi atīta cittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti

original: Na atītacittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti.
analyzed: na atīta cittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti

original: Tena hi anāgatacittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti?
analyzed: tena hi anāgata cittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti

original: Na anāgatacittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti.
analyzed: na anāgata cittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti

original: Tena hi paccuppannalokiyacittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti?
analyzed: tena hi paccuppanna lokiya cittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti

original: Na paccuppannalokiyacittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti.
analyzed: na paccuppanna lokiya cittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti

original: Lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe paccuppannacittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti.
analyzed: lokuttara magga kkhaṇe paccuppanna cittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti

original: Kathaṁ lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe paccuppannacittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti?
analyzed: katham lokuttara magga kkhaṇe paccuppanna cittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti

original: Lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe uppādādhipateyyaṁ cittaṁ ñāṇassa hetu paccayo ca taṁsampayuttaṁ
analyzed: lokuttara magga kkhaṇe uppāda ādhipateyyam cittam ñāṇassa hetu paccayo ca

original: nirodhagocaraṁ dassanādhipateyyaṁ ñāṇaṁ cittassa hetu paccayo ca taṁsampayuttaṁ ñāṇaṁ nirodhagocaraṁ.
analyzed: nirodha gocaram dassana ādhipateyyam ñāṇam cittassa hetu paccayo ca ta sampayuttam ñāṇam nirodha gocara

original: Evaṁ lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe paccuppannacittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti.
analyzed: evam lokuttara magga kkhaṇe paccuppanna cittena ca ñāṇena ca abhisameti

original: Kiṁ nu ettakoyeva abhisamayoti?
analyzed: kim nu

original: Na hi.
analyzed: na hi

original: Lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe dassanābhisamayo sammādiṭṭhi, abhiniropanābhisamayo sammāsaṅkappo,
analyzed: lokuttara magga kkhaṇe dassana abhisamayo sammādiṭṭhi abhiniropana abhisamayo sammāsaṅkappo

original: pariggahābhisamayo sammāvācā, samuṭṭhānābhisamayo sammākammanto, vodānābhisamayo
analyzed: pariggaha abhisamayo sammā vācā samuṭṭhāna abhisamayo sammā kammantaḥ vodāna abhisamayo

original: sammāājīvo, paggahābhisamayo sammāvāyāmo, upaṭṭhānābhisamayo sammāsati, avikkhepābhisamayo sammāsamādhi;
analyzed: sammāājīvaḥ paggaha abhisamayo sammāvāyāmaḥ upaṭṭhāna abhisamayo sammā sati avikkhepa abhisamayo sammā samādhi

original: upaṭṭhānābhisamayo satisambojjhaṅgo, pavicayābhisamayo dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo,
analyzed: upaṭṭhāna abhisamayo sati sambojjhaṅgo pavicaya abhisamayo dhamma vicaya sambojjhaṅgo

original: paggahābhisamayo vīriyasambojjhaṅgo, pharaṇābhisamayo pītisambojjhaṅgo, upasamābhisamayo
analyzed: paggaha abhisamayaḥ vīriya sambojjhaṅgo pharaṇa abhisamayaḥ pīti sambojjhaṅgaḥ upasama abhisamayaḥ

original: passaddhisambojjhaṅgo, avikkhepābhisamayo samādhisambojjhaṅgo, paṭisaṅkhānābhisamayo
analyzed: passaddhi sambojjhaṅgaḥ avikkhepa abhisamayaḥ samādhi sambojjhaṅgaḥ paṭisaṅkhāna abhisamayaḥ

original: upekkhāsambojjhaṅgo;
analyzed: upekkhā sambojjhaṅgo

original: assaddhiye akampiyābhisamayo saddhābalaṁ, kosajje akampiyābhisamayo vīriyabalaṁ,
analyzed: akampiya abhisamayaḥ saddhā bala kosajje akampiya abhisamayaḥ vīriya bala

original: pamāde akampiyābhisamayo satibalaṁ, uddhacce akampiyābhisamayo samādhibalaṁ, avijjāya
analyzed: pamāde akampiya abhisamayaḥ sati bala uddhacce akampiya abhisamayaḥ samādhi bala avijjāya

original: akampiyābhisamayo paññābalaṁ;
analyzed: akampiya abhisamayo

original: adhimokkhābhisamayo saddhindriyaṁ, paggahābhisamayo vīriyindriyaṁ, upaṭṭhānābhisamayo satindriyaṁ, avikkhepābhisamayo samādhindriyaṁ, dassanābhisamayo paññindriyaṁ.
analyzed: adhimokkha abhisamayo saddhi indriya paggaha abhisamayaḥ vīriya indriya upaṭṭhāna abhisamayo sati indriya avikkhepa abhisamayo samādhi indriya dassana abhisamayo paññindriya

original: Ādhipateyyaṭṭhena indriyābhisamayo, akampiyaṭṭhena balābhisamayo, niyyānaṭṭhena bojjhaṅgābhisamayo,
analyzed: ādhipateyya ṭṭhena indriya abhisamayaḥ akampiya ṭṭhena bala abhisamayaḥ niyyāna ṭṭhena bojjhaṅga abhisamayaḥ

original: hetuṭṭhena maggābhisamayo, upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena satipaṭṭhānābhisamayo, padahaṭṭhena sammappadhānābhisamayo,
analyzed: hetu ṭṭhena magga abhisamayaḥ upaṭṭhāna ṭṭhena sati paṭṭhāna abhisamayaḥ padaha ṭṭhena sammappadhāna abhisamayaḥ

original: ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhipādābhisamayo, tathaṭṭhena saccābhisamayo, avikkhepaṭṭhena samathābhisamayo,
analyzed: ijjhana ṭhena iddhipāda abhisamayo tatha ṭhena sacca abhisamayo avikkhepa ṭhena samatha abhisamayo

original: anupassanaṭṭhena vipassanābhisamayo, ekarasaṭṭhena samathavipassanābhisamayo, anativattanaṭṭhena
analyzed: anupassana ṭhena vipassanā abhisamayaḥ ekarasa ṭhena samatha vipassanā abhisamayaḥ an ativattana ṭhena

original: yuganaddhābhisamayo, saṁvaraṭṭhena sīlavisuddhiabhisamayo, avikkhepaṭṭhena visuddhiabhisamayo,
analyzed: yuga naddha abhisamayo savara ṭṭhena sīla visuddhi abhisamayo avikkhepa ṭṭhena visuddhi abhisamayo

original: dassanaṭṭhena diṭṭhivisuddhiabhisamayo, muttaṭṭhena vimokkhābhisamayo, paṭivedhaṭṭhena
analyzed: dassana ṭṭhena diṭṭhi visuddhi abhisamayaḥ mutta ṭṭhena vimokkha abhisamayaḥ paṭivedha ṭṭhena

original: vijjābhisamayo, pariccāgaṭṭhena vimuttiabhisamayo, samucchedaṭṭhena khaye ñāṇaṁ abhisamayo.
analyzed: vijjā abhisamayo pariccāga ṭṭhena vimutti abhisamayo samuccheda ṭṭhena khaye ñāṇam abhisamayo

original: Chando mūlaṭṭhena abhisamayo, manasikāro samuṭṭhānaṭṭhena abhisamayo, phasso samodhānaṭṭhena
analyzed: chandaḥ mūla ṭṭhena abhisamayaḥ manasikāro samuṭṭhāna ṭṭhena abhisamayaḥ phasso samodhāna ṭṭhena

original: abhisamayo, vedanā samosaraṇaṭṭhena abhisamayo, samādhi pamukhaṭṭhena abhisamayo,
analyzed: abhisamayo vedanā samosaraṇa ṭhena abhisamayo samādhi pamukha ṭṭhena abhisamayo

original: sati ādhipateyyaṭṭhena abhisamayo, paññā taduttaraṭṭhena abhisamayo, vimutti sāraṭṭhena
analyzed: sati ādhipateyya ṭṭhena abhisamayaḥ paññā tad uttara ṭṭhena abhisamayaḥ vimutti sāra ṭṭhena

original: abhisamayo, amatogadhaṁ nibbānaṁ pariyosānaṭṭhena abhisamayo.
analyzed: abhisamayaḥ amatogadham nibbānam pariyosāna ṭṭhena abhisamayaḥ

original: Kiṁ nu ettakoyeva abhisamayoti?
analyzed: kim nu

original: Na hi.
analyzed: na hi

original: Sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe dassanābhisamayo sammādiṭṭhi …pe…
analyzed: sotāpatti magga kkhaṇe dassana abhisamayaḥ sammādiṭṭhi pe

original: amatogadhaṁ nibbānaṁ pariyosānaṭṭhena abhisamayo.
analyzed: amatogadham nibbānam pariyosāna ṭṭhena abhisamayaḥ

original: Kiṁ nu ettakoyeva abhisamayoti?
analyzed: kim nu

original: Na hi.
analyzed: na hi

original: Sotāpattiphalakkhaṇe dassanābhisamayo sammādiṭṭhi …pe…
analyzed: sotāpatti phala khaṇe dassana abhisamayaḥ sammādiṭṭhi pe

original: paṭippassaddhaṭṭhena anuppāde ñāṇaṁ abhisamayo.
analyzed: paṭippassaddha ṭṭhena anuppāde ñāṇam abhisamayaḥ

original: Chando mūlaṭṭhena abhisamayo …pe…
analyzed: chandaḥ mūlaṭṭhena abhisamayaḥ pe

original: amatogadhaṁ nibbānaṁ pariyosānaṭṭhena abhisamayo.
analyzed: amatogadham nibbānam pariyosāna ṭṭhena abhisamayaḥ

original: Kiṁ nu ettakoyeva abhisamayoti?
analyzed: kim nu

original: Na hi.
analyzed: na hi

original: Sakadāgāmimaggakkhaṇe …pe…
analyzed: sakadāgāmi magga kkhaṇe pe

original: sakadāgāmiphalakkhaṇe …
analyzed: sakadāgāmi pha lakkhaṇe

original: anāgāmimaggakkhaṇe …
analyzed: anāgāmi magga kkhaṇe

original: anāgāmiphalakkhaṇe …
analyzed: anāgāmi pha lakkhaṇe

original: arahattamaggakkhaṇe …pe…
analyzed: arahatta magga kkhaṇe pe

original: arahattaphalakkhaṇe dassanābhisamayo sammādiṭṭhi, abhiniropanābhisamayo sammāsaṅkappo …pe…
analyzed: arahatta phala kkhaṇe dassana abhisamayo sammādiṭṭhi abhiniropana abhisamayo sammāsaṅkappo pe

original: paṭippassaddhaṭṭhena anuppāde ñāṇaṁ abhisamayo.
analyzed: paṭippassaddha ṭṭhena anuppāde ñāṇam abhisamayaḥ

original: Chando mūlaṭṭhena abhisamayo …pe…
analyzed: chandaḥ mūlaṭṭhena abhisamayaḥ pe

original: amatogadhaṁ nibbānaṁ pariyosānaṭṭhena abhisamayo.
analyzed: amatogadham nibbānam pariyosāna ṭṭhena abhisamayaḥ

original: Yvāyaṁ kilese pajahati, atīte kilese pajahati …pe…
analyzed: yvā ayam kilese pajahati atīte kilese pajahati pe

original: anāgate kilese pajahati, paccuppanne kilese pajahati, atīte kilese pajahatīti.
analyzed: anāgate kilese pajahati paccuppanne kilese pajahati atīte kilese pajahati iti

original: Hañci atīte kilese pajahati, tena hi khīṇaṁ khepeti, niruddhaṁ nirodheti, vigataṁ vigameti, atthaṅgataṁ atthaṅgameti, atītaṁ yaṁ na atthi taṁ pajahatīti?
analyzed: hañci atīte kilese pajahati tena hi khīṇam khepeti niruddham nirodheti vigatam vigameti atthaṅgatam atthaṅgama iti atītam yam na atthi tam pajahati iti

original: Na atīte kilese pajahatīti.
analyzed: na atīte kilese pajahati iti

original: Anāgate kilese pajahatīti.
analyzed: anāgate kilese pajahati iti

original: Hañci anāgate kilese pajahati, tena hi ajātaṁ pajahati, anibbattaṁ pajahati, anuppannaṁ pajahati, apātubhūtaṁ pajahati, anāgataṁ yaṁ na atthi taṁ pajahatīti?
analyzed: hañci anāgate kilese pajahati tena hi a jātam pajahati anibbattam pajahati anuppannam pajahati a pātubhūtam pajahati anāgatam yam na atthi tam pajahati iti

original: Na anāgate kilese pajahatīti.
analyzed: na anāgate kilese pajahati iti

original: Paccuppanne kilese pajahatīti.
analyzed: paccuppanne kilese pajahati iti

original: Hañci paccuppanne kilese pajahati, tena hi ratto rāgaṁ pajahati, duṭṭho dosaṁ pajahati,
analyzed: hañci paccuppanne kilese pajahati tena hi rattaḥ rāgam pajahati duṭṭhaḥ dosam pajahati

original: mūḷho mohaṁ pajahati, vinibaddho mānaṁ pajahati, parāmaṭṭho diṭṭhiṁ pajahati, vikkhepagato
analyzed: mūḷhaḥ moham pajahati vinibaddhaḥ mānam pajahati parāmaṭṭhaḥ diṭṭhim pajahati vikkhepa gataḥ

original: uddhaccaṁ pajahati, aniṭṭhaṅgato vicikicchaṁ pajahati, thāmagato anusayaṁ pajahati,
analyzed: uddhaccam pajahati a niṭṭhaṅgataḥ vicikiccham pajahati thāma gataḥ anusayam pajahati

original: kaṇhasukkadhammā yuganaddhā samameva vattanti, saṅkilesikā maggabhāvanā hoti?
analyzed: kaṇha sukka dhammā yuga naddhā samam eva vattanti saṅkilesikā magga bhāvanā hoti

original: Na hi atīte kilese pajahati, na anāgate kilese pajahati, na paccuppanne kilese pajahatīti.
analyzed: na hi atīte kilese pajahati na anāgate kilese pajahati na paccuppanne kilese pajahati iti

original: Hañci na atīte kilese pajahati, na anāgate …pe…
analyzed: hañci na atīte kilese pajahati na anāgate pe

original: na paccuppanne kilese pajahati, tena hi natthi maggabhāvanā, natthi phalasacchikiriyā, natthi kilesappahānaṁ, natthi dhammābhisamayoti?
analyzed: na paccuppanne kilese pajahati tena hi natthi magga bhāvanā natthi phala sacchikiriyā natthi kilesa ppahāna natthi dhamma abhisamayo ti

original: Atthi maggabhāvanā, atthi phalasacchikiriyā, atthi kilesappahānaṁ, atthi dhammābhisamayo.
analyzed: atthi magga bhāvanā atthi phala sacchikiriyā atthi kilesa ppahāna atthi dhamma abhisamayo

original: Yathā kathaṁ viya?
analyzed: yathā katham

original: Seyyathāpi taruṇo rukkho ajātaphalo.
analyzed: seyyathā api taruṇaḥ rukkhaḥ a jāta phalaḥ

original: Tamenaṁ puriso mūlaṁ chindeyya.
analyzed: tam enam purisaḥ mūlam chindeyya

original: Ye tassa rukkhassa ajātaphalā, te ajātāyeva na jāyanti, anibbattāyeva na nibbattanti, anuppannāyeva na uppajjanti, apātubhūtāyeva na pātubhavanti.
analyzed: ye tassa rukkhassa a jāta phalā te a jātāya iva na jāyanti a nibbattāya iva na nibbattanti anuppannāya iva na uppajjanti a pātubhūtāya iva na pātubhavanti

original: Evamevaṁ uppādo hetu, uppādo paccayo kilesānaṁ nibbattiyāti.
analyzed: evam evam uppādaḥ hetu uppādaḥ paccayaḥ kilesānam nibbattiyā ati

original: Uppāde ādīnavaṁ disvā anuppāde cittaṁ pakkhandati.
analyzed: uppāde ādīnavam disvā anuppāde cittam pakkhandati

original: Anuppāde cittassa pakkhandattā ye uppādapaccayā kilesā nibbatteyyuṁ, te ajātāyeva
analyzed: anuppāde cittassa pakkhanda ttāḥ ye uppāda paccayā kilesā nibbatteyyu te a jātāya iva

original: na jāyanti, anibbattāyeva na nibbattanti, anuppannāyeva na uppajjanti, apātubhūtāyeva na pātubhavanti.
analyzed: na jāyanti a nibbattāya iva na nibbattanti anuppannāya iva na uppajjanti apātubhūtāya iva na pātubhavanti

original: Evaṁ hetunirodhā dukkhanirodho.
analyzed: evam hetu nirodhā dukkha nirodho

original: Pavattaṁ hetu, nimittaṁ hetu, āyūhanā hetu.
analyzed: pavattam hetu nimittam hetu āyūhanā hetu

original: Āyūhanā paccayo kilesānaṁ nibbattiyāti.
analyzed: āyūhanā paccayaḥ kilesānam nibbattiyā ati

original: Āyūhane ādīnavaṁ disvā anāyūhane cittaṁ pakkhandati.
analyzed: āyūhane ādīnavam disvā an āyūhane cittam pakkhandati

original: Anāyūhane cittassa pakkhandattā, ye āyūhanapaccayā kilesā nibbatteyyuṁ, te ajātāyeva
analyzed: an āyūhane cittassa ye āyūhana paccayā kilesā nibbatteyyu te a jātāya iva

original: na jāyanti, anibbattāyeva na nibbattanti, anuppannāyeva na uppajjanti, apātubhūtāyeva na pātubhavanti.
analyzed: na jāyanti a nibbattāya iva na nibbattanti anuppannāya iva na uppajjanti apātubhūtāya iva na pātubhavanti

original: Evaṁ hetunirodhā dukkhanirodho.
analyzed: evam hetu nirodhā dukkha nirodho

original: Evaṁ atthi maggabhāvanā, atthi phalasacchikiriyā, atthi kilesappahānaṁ, atthi dhammābhisamayoti.
analyzed: evam atthi magga bhāvanā atthi phala sacchikiriyā atthi kilesa ppahāna atthi dhamma abhisamaya ti

original: Abhisamayakathā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: abhisamaya kathā niṭṭhitā
